agent.balanceLoadFailed: Failed to load balance. Please try again.
agent.youAreController: You are a controller of this agent
agent.accountBalanceDesc: Available balance for transfers and transactions
agent.accountBalanceTooltip: This is your on-chain account balance, available for regular transfers, gas fees, and other on-chain operations
agent.paymentChannelBalanceDesc: Reserved balance for fast payment channels
agent.paymentChannelBalanceTooltip: This is the balance dedicated to payment channels. Payment channels enable fast, low-cost micro-payments without submitting on-chain transactions each time. When channels are active, a portion of the balance is locked as collateral.

identity.title: Identity Information
identity.userDidTooltip: This is your main identity identifier
identity.agentDidTooltip: User DID is your main identity identifier, Agent DID is the AI agent identity you created

agent.title: AI Agent DIDs
agent.noAgents: You haven't created any Agent DIDs yet

passkey.creatingMessage: Please complete the passkey creation on your device
passkey.createSubtitle: We will use the passkey to generate your Nuwa DID.
passkey.noteMessage: Please Note: The passkey will be securely stored on your device for DID authentication and management.

errors.userCancelledDescription: You cancelled the Passkey creation. To continue using Nuwa DID, please click Create Passkey again.
errors.timeoutDescription: The Passkey operation timed out. Please try again and ensure your device supports biometric authentication and it's enabled.
errors.notAllowedDescription: The Passkey operation was not allowed due to security policy restrictions. Please refresh the page and try again, or check your browser settings.
errors.unsupportedDescription: Your device or browser doesn't support Passkey functionality. Please use a modern browser that supports WebAuthn.
errors.genericDescription: An error occurred while creating the Passkey. Please try again. If the problem persists, contact technical support.
errors.alreadyExistsDescription: You have already created a Passkey on this device. To use a new Passkey, please clear your browser data first.

transfer.successDescription: Successfully transferred RGAS to the recipient
transfer.accountTransferDescription: Transfer from your account balance to another address
transfer.hubTransferDescription: Transfer from your payment hub balance to another address's payment hub
transfer.hubTransferSuccessDescription: Successfully transferred RGAS to the recipient's payment hub
transfer.depositToHubDescription: Transfer from account balance to payment hub balance
transfer.depositSuccessDescription: Successfully deposited RGAS to your payment hub
transfer.withdrawFromHubDescription: Withdraw from payment hub balance to account balance
transfer.withdrawSuccessDescription: Successfully withdrew RGAS to your account balance
transfer.withdrawAllSuccessDescription: Successfully withdrew all available RGAS to your account balance
transfer.cannotTransferToSelf: Cannot transfer to your own address
transfer.invalidHubRecipientFormat: Invalid format. Please enter a valid DID or Rooch address
transfer.hubTransferInfo: Only unlocked balance can be transferred. Locked balance is held as collateral for active payment channels.
transfer.withdrawInfo: Withdraw funds from payment hub to account balance. Only unlocked (non-locked) funds can be withdrawn.
transfer.lockedBalanceWarning: You have {{count}} active payment channels. {{amount}} RGAS is locked as collateral. Close channels to release these funds.
transfer.depositInfo: Transfer funds from account balance to payment hub for fast payments. After depositing, you can open payment channels for instant micro-payments without waiting for blockchain confirmation.
transfer.depositNote: After deposit, you can use the funds to open payment channels for instant, low-cost transactions without waiting for blockchain confirmation each time.
